headline: Monster (MNST) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Also on the call are Tom Kelly, our Chief Financial Officer; Emelie Tirre, our Chief Commercial Officer; Rob Gehring, our Chief Growth Officer; Guy Carding, our President of EMEA and OSP; and Mark Astrachan, our Senior VP of Investor Relations and Corporate Development.  In the United States, according to Nielsen, for the recently reported 13-week period through October 25, 2025, sales in dollars in the energy drink category, including energy shots for all outlets combined, namely convenience, grocery, drug, mass merchandisers, increased by 12.2% versus the same period a year ago.
